summary:
I’m a passionate and driven professional with diversity of background and work experience involving innovation projects, developing and implementing the best solutions for Business Strategies and Process Improvement.

Working focused on results and Customer Service, providing innovation and solutions, specialized in project management, business modelling and process improvement.

Brazilian and Portuguese Citizenships with International Experience in New Zealand and The Netherlands.

• Competencies & Skills:
Project Management (PMP/PMI, SCRUM, Black Belt/Lean Six Sigma)
Business Process Management (BPM), Development and Improvement
Strategic Project Portfolio Management
Corporate Finance, Accounting, Strategic Planning, Business Development and Valuation
Management Systems and ERP / IT Solution Implementation and Improvement
Basic Front-End Web Development (HTML5, CSS, Javascript, PHP7, Bootstrap, Jquery, AJAX)
Basic Back-End Web Development (MySQL)

• Industries:
Oil Gas and Fuels, Sugarcane, Retail, Service Industry, Construction, Mining, Real State, Energy/Water/Waste, Shared Service Centers, Telecom, Software Factory, Logistics, Consulting and Start-ups.

• Specific Knowledge in areas and processes:
Supply Chain (Procure to Pay and Make to Stock/Order), Finance (Order to Cash), IT (ITIL), HR (Hire to Retire), CRM/Marketing/Sales

• Systems:
Office Applications, MS-Project, SAP, Oracle, Totvs, Sharepoint, PowerBI

• Languages:
English: Fluent (111/120 @ TOEFL) 
Portuguese: Native
Spanish: Basic
Dutch: First Steps

projects.title: Sugaralcohol Conglomerate´s Control Sale
projects.description:
Foreign Investor looking to purchase control of a major sugaralcohol player in Brazil
Full Financial Statement analysis
Cashflow Projection
Sugaralcohol´s economic sector assessment
Debt analysis and re-structuring alternatives

projects.title: Lawfirm Performance Evaluation / Survey
projects.description:
Over 20 projects of this nature were conducted and delivered from 2003 to 2016
Lawfirm cost, revenue and cashflow assessment
Profit Margin and key business process analysis 
Financial Statement analysis and Cash flow projection
Presentation for partners
PS: Lawfirm´s generally unsuitable records prevented a deeper understanding of the most profitable legal areas
PS2: Regardless of the unsuitable records, the good records were consolidated into a legal services performance survey / study still in use today for benchmarking

projects.title: Energy Efficiency
projects.description:
Project aimed at bringing better energy efficiency for the company by replacing lights, fridges and other energy-consuming store equipment
Business case and implementation plan elaboration

projects.title: Valuation @ Litigious Lawfirm Split
projects.description:
Expert Assistance during case to properly assess Lawfirm´s valuation with intangible assets considered
Full Financial Statement analysis
Cashflow Projection
Intangible Asset valuation
Valuation premise and scenario simulations with splitting partner
Presentation for judge and other specialists
PS: The client was in a disavantegeous negotiating position which was minimized by Ribeiro & Guimarães´ valuation methodology

projects.title: Valuation with Intangible Asset Assessment for Lawfirms
projects.description:
Over 10 projects of this nature were conducted and delivered from 2009 and 2016 for lawfirms of various sizes in Brazil
Different Lawfirm operations involved (takeovers, M&A´s, Splits, etc)
Full Financial Statement analysis
Cashflow Projection
Intangible Asset valuation with a systematic approach to understanding a Lawfirm´s intangible value
Valuation premise and scenario simulations with partners and teams
Presentation for partners and financial agents
Implementation of operation in some cases (takeover, M&A, split, etc)
PS: This innovative methodolgy was 100% conceived by Ribeiro e Guimarães and is tailor-made for Lawfirms

profile_positions.description:
